attrs.script:
#! /bin/sh
source /etc/profile
end=$((SECONDS+60))
nodes=0

while [ $SECONDS -lt $end ] && [ $nodes != "1" ]; do
	nodes=$(discover_nodes | grep "u'eth0'" | egrep "@@{DummyAPI.CVM01_IP}@@" | wc -l)
    sleep 10
done

if [[ $nodes != "1" ]]; then 
exit 1 
fi

attrs.script:
#! /bin/sh

source /etc/profile

# Shutdown
acli vm.shutdown @@{Nested_AHV01.name}@@

# Wait for shutdown completion
end=$((SECONDS+60))
vm_off=""

while [ $SECONDS -lt $end ] && [ -z "$vm_off" ]; do
	vm_off=$(acli vm.list power_state=off | grep @@{Nested_AHV01.name}@@)
    sleep 10
done

if [[ -z "$vm_off" ]]; then 
exit 1 
fi

    
# Update VM
acli vm.update @@{Nested_AHV01.name}@@ cpu_passthrough=true


# PowerON
acli vm.on @@{Nested_AHV01.name}@@

cloud_init.user_data:
#cloud-config
hostname: AHV-1
write_files:
- content: |
    AHV-1
  path: /etc/hostname
- content: |
    DEVICE="br0"
    NM_CONTROLLED=no
    DEVICETYPE=ovs
    TYPE=OVSIntPort
    BOOTPROTO=none
    IPADDR=@@{DummyAPI.AHV01_IP}@@
    NETMASK=255.255.255.0
    GATEWAY=@@{DummyAPI.GATEWAY_IP}@@
    OVSREQUIRES=eth0
  path: /etc/sysconfig/network-scripts/ifcfg-br0
- content: |
    DEVICE=tun0
    TYPE=IPIP
    MY_OUTER_IPADDR=@@{DummyAPI.AHV01_IP}@@
    PEER_OUTER_IPADDR=@@{DummyAPI.CVM01_IP}@@
    MY_INNER_IPADDR=192.168.5.1/24
    PEER_INNER_IPADDR=192.168.5.3/24
    ONBOOT=yes
    ARPCHECK=no
  path: /etc/sysconfig/network-scripts/ifcfg-tun0
runcmd:
- service network restart

attrs.script:
# Variables
ipam_url = '@@{IPAM_URL}@@'
ipam_username = '@@{IPAM_USERNAME}@@'
ipam_password = '@@{IPAM_PASSWORD}@@'
headers = {'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Accept': 'application/json'}

# Get Token
api_url = "http://"+ipam_url+"/api/emeagso/user"  
resp = urlreq(api_url, verb='POST', auth='BASIC', user=ipam_username, passwd=ipam_password, headers=headers)
r = json.loads(resp.content)

print('Status code: {0}'.format(resp.status_code))
print('Resp: {0}'.format(resp))
print('JSON: {0}'.format(json.loads(resp.content)))
print("TOKEN: {0}".format(json.loads(resp.content)['data']['token']))

print "IPAM_TOKEN=",r['data']['token']

# Variables
ipam_url = '@@{IPAM_URL}@@'
ipam_username = '@@{IPAM_USERNAME}@@'
ipam_password = '@@{IPAM_PASSWORD}@@'
ipam_token = '@@{IPAM_TOKEN}@@'
headers = {'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Accept': 'application/json', 'token': ipam_token}

# Get Subnets
api_url = "http://"+ipam_url+"/api/emeagso/sections/1/subnets"  
resp = urlreq(api_url, verb='GET', auth='BASIC', user=ipam_username, passwd=ipam_password, headers=headers)
r = json.loads(resp.text)
data=r['data']

# Parsing, getting subnet with 0 IPs Allocated
for element in data:
    subnet=element['usage']['used']
    if subnet == "0":
        print "FREE_SUBNET=",element['subnet']
        print "FREE_SUBNET_ID=",element['id']
        break
    else:
       continue

# Variables
ipam_url = '@@{IPAM_URL}@@'
ipam_username = '@@{IPAM_USERNAME}@@'
ipam_password = '@@{IPAM_PASSWORD}@@'
ipam_token = '@@{IPAM_TOKEN}@@'
ipam_free_subnet_id = '@@{FREE_SUBNET_ID}@@'
ipam_free_subnet = '@@{FREE_SUBNET}@@'
headers = {'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Accept': 'application/json', 'token': ipam_token}
hosts = '@@{NestedVMs}@@'.split(',')
owner = '@@{calm_username}@@'


# Determining Gateway VLAN98 or VLAN99
free_subnet=ipam_free_subnet.split('.')
if free_subnet[2] == "98":
  print "GATEWAY_IP=10.68.98.1"
elif free_subnet[2] == "99":
  print "GATEWAY_IP=10.68.99.1"
else:
  print "error"
  exit(1)
    
# Allocate IPs on the subnet
api_url = "http://"+ipam_url+"/api/emeagso/addresses/first_free/"+ipam_free_subnet_id+""

for host in hosts:
  payload = {"hostname": host, "description": host, "owner": owner}
  resp = urlreq(api_url, verb='POST', auth='BASIC', user=ipam_username, passwd=ipam_password, params=json.dumps(payload), headers=headers)
  r = json.loads(resp.content)
  print host+"_IP=",r['data']

# Variables
ipam_url = '@@{IPAM_URL}@@'
ipam_username = '@@{IPAM_USERNAME}@@'
ipam_password = '@@{IPAM_PASSWORD}@@'
headers = {'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Accept': 'application/json'}


# Get Token
api_url = "http://"+ipam_url+"/api/emeagso/user" 
resp = urlreq(api_url, verb='POST', auth='BASIC', user=ipam_username, passwd=ipam_password, headers=headers)
r = json.loads(resp.content)

print('Status code: {0}'.format(resp.status_code))
print('Resp: {0}'.format(resp))
print('JSON: {0}'.format(json.loads(resp.content)))
print("TOKEN: {0}".format(json.loads(resp.content)['data']['token']))

print "IPAM_TOKEN=",r['data']['token']

# Variables
ipam_url = '@@{IPAM_URL}@@'
ipam_username = '@@{IPAM_USERNAME}@@'
ipam_password = '@@{IPAM_PASSWORD}@@'
ipam_token = '@@{IPAM_TOKEN}@@'
ipam_free_subnet_id ='@@{FREE_SUBNET_ID}@@'
headers = {'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Accept': 'application/json', 'token': ipam_token}

# Allocate IPs on the subnet
headers = {'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Accept': 'application/json', 'token': ipam_token}
hosts_IPs = ["@@{AHV01_IP}@@", "@@{CVM01_IP}@@"]

for IP in hosts_IPs:
  api_url = "http://"+ipam_url+"/api/emeagso/addresses/"+IP+"/"+ipam_free_subnet_id+""
  resp = urlreq(api_url, verb='DELETE', auth='BASIC', user=ipam_username, passwd=ipam_password, headers=headers)
  r = json.loads(resp.content)
  print r

attrs.script:
#! /bin/sh
source /etc/profile
end=$((SECONDS+60))
nodes=0

while [ $SECONDS -lt $end ] && [ $nodes != "1" ]; do
	nodes=$(discover_nodes | grep "u'eth0'" | egrep "@@{DummyAPI.CVM01_IP}@@" | wc -l)
    sleep 10
done

if [[ $nodes != "1" ]]; then 
exit 1 
fi

attrs.script:
#! /bin/sh

source /etc/profile

# Shutdown
acli vm.shutdown @@{Nested_AHV01.name}@@

# Wait for shutdown completion
end=$((SECONDS+60))
vm_off=""

while [ $SECONDS -lt $end ] && [ -z "$vm_off" ]; do
	vm_off=$(acli vm.list power_state=off | grep @@{Nested_AHV01.name}@@)
    sleep 10
done

if [[ -z "$vm_off" ]]; then 
exit 1 
fi

    
# Update VM
acli vm.update @@{Nested_AHV01.name}@@ cpu_passthrough=true


# PowerON
acli vm.on @@{Nested_AHV01.name}@@

#cloud-config
hostname: AHV-1
write_files:
- content: |
    AHV-1
  path: /etc/hostname
- content: |
    DEVICE="br0"
    NM_CONTROLLED=no
    DEVICETYPE=ovs
    TYPE=OVSIntPort
    BOOTPROTO=none
    IPADDR=@@{DummyAPI.AHV01_IP}@@
    NETMASK=255.255.255.0
    GATEWAY=@@{DummyAPI.GATEWAY_IP}@@
    OVSREQUIRES=eth0
  path: /etc/sysconfig/network-scripts/ifcfg-br0
- content: |
    DEVICE=tun0
    TYPE=IPIP
    MY_OUTER_IPADDR=@@{DummyAPI.AHV01_IP}@@
    PEER_OUTER_IPADDR=@@{DummyAPI.CVM01_IP}@@
    MY_INNER_IPADDR=192.168.5.1/24
    PEER_INNER_IPADDR=192.168.5.3/24
    ONBOOT=yes
    ARPCHECK=no
  path: /etc/sysconfig/network-scripts/ifcfg-tun0
runcmd:
- service network restart

    DEVICE="eth0"
    NM_CONTROLLED="no"
    ONBOOT="yes"
    BOOTPROTO=static
    IPADDR=@@{DummyAPI.CVM01_IP}@@
    NETMASK=255.255.255.0
    GATEWAY=@@{DummyAPI.GATEWAY_IP}@@
  path: /etc/sysconfig/network-scripts/ifcfg-eth0
- content: |
    ARPCHECK="no"
    PEER_OUTER_IPADDR=@@{DummyAPI.AHV01_IP}@@
    NM_CONTROLLED="no"
    MY_OUTER_IPADDR=@@{DummyAPI.CVM01_IP}@@
    PEER_INNER_IPADDR="192.168.5.1/24"
    DEVICE="tun0"
    MY_INNER_IPADDR="192.168.5.3/24"
    TYPE="IPIP"
    ONBOOT="yes"
    BOOTPROTO="none"
  path: /etc/sysconfig/network-scripts/ifcfg-tun0
runcmd:
- service network restart
